activities.organization: IEEE Computer Society University of Ruhuna
activities.description: Conducted a workshop on Advanced Problem Solving Techniques. Discussed three key techniques including dynamic programming, sliding window and shortest path algorithms with hands-on coding.

activities.organization: IEEE Computer Society University of Ruhuna
activities.description: Conducted workshops on competitive programming under AXIOM 2.0 workshop series. Mainly focused on competitive programming with C++.

activities.organization: IEEE Computer Society University of Ruhuna
activities.description: Contributed to RedCypher 1.0, the first ever CTF competition organized by a government university. Created CTF challenges and solutions and provided support for required software infrastructure.

activities.organization: IEEE Computer Society University of Ruhuna
activities.description: Developed competitive programming questions for HaxTreme hackathon.

activities.organization: IEEE Computer Society University of Ruhuna

Conducted 12 mathematics seminars for O/L students in rural areas.
